title: Suggestion: treat panic(nil) as no-op
body:
by **xrfang**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

use panic(nil) in code

What is the expected output?

if the parameter to panic() (usually an err) is nil, it should not panic but just treat
it as a no-op

Which operating system are you using?

Ubuntu Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go1
